sqlMap.select: select a.xzdxzqh xzdxzqh,a.xzdxzqhdm xzdxzqhdm,a.qyid qyid,a.ryid ryid,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,a.cyrybh cyrybh,a.cyrylbdm cyrylbdm,a.cyrylbmc cyrylbmc,a.xm xm,a.qm qm,a.bm bm,a.xmpy xmpy,a.gjdm gjdm,a.gj gj,a.mzdm mzdm,a.minzu minzu,a.xbdm xbdm,a.xb xb,a.csrq csrq,a.hyzkdm hyzkdm,a.hyzk hyzk,a.shengao shengao,a.tizh tizh,a.hjdxzqh hjdxzqh,a.hjdxzqhdm hjdxzqhdm,a.hjdxz hjdxz,a.cyzjdm cyzjdm,a.cyzj cyzj,a.zjhm zjhm,a.zzzhm zzzhm,a.zzdz zzdz,a.gwbh gwbh,a.gwmc gwmc,a.gwzrms gwzrms,a.shouji shouji,a.lxdh lxdh,a.jjlxr jjlxr,a.jjlxrdh jjlxrdh,a.gzdm gzdm,a.gz gz,a.zhiwu zhiwu,a.rzrq rzrq,a.cyryztdm cyryztdm,a.cyryzt cyryzt,a.zxr zxr,a.zxbz zxbz,a.zxsj zxsj,a.lrsj lrsj,a.lrr lrr,a.lrdwbm lrdwbm,a.lrdwmc lrdwmc,a.hcdw hcdw,a.hcr hcr,a.hcsj hcsj,a.zxyy zxyy,a.zkzt zkzt,a.bcsj bcsj,a.dcbs dcbs,a.bz bz,a.scbz scbz,a.biduiflag biduiflag,a.zpwtgyy zpwtgyy,a.zt zt,a.yjbz yjbz,a.yjsj yjsj ,b.qymc,b.qybm ,a.lzrq , a.xxdm,a.xx ,a.whcd,a.whcddm , a.cylbdm , a.cylb,a.djrq,a.hjlbdm,a.hjlbmc,a.zzmmdm,a.zzmmmc ,a.kdywyzyzgzhm kdywyzyzgzhm from t_qyryxx a ,t_qyjbxx b where a.qyid=b.qyid and a.cyrybh=#value#

select a.qyid qyid,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,a.qybm qybm,a.qymc qymc,a.qyqp qyqp, a.qyjp qyjp,a.qyzflbm qyzflbm,a.qyzflmc qyzflmc,a.qyfflbm qyfflbm,a.qyfflmc qyfflmc, a.gxdwbm gxdwbm,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc,a.ssdxjgajgdm ssdxjgajgdm,a.ssdxjgajgmc ssdxjgajgmc, a.ssddsjgdm ssddsjgdm,a.ssddsjgmc ssddsjgmc,a.qyzzjgdm qyzzjgdm,a.lxdh lxdh, a.yzbm yzbm,a.chzh chzh,a.jwdzb jwdzb,a.jjlxbm jjlxbm,a.jjlxmc jjlxmc,a.jyfwzy jyfwzy, a.jyfwjy jyfwjy,a.zczj zczj,a.jymj jymj,a.zabdm zabdm,a.zajbmc zajbmc,a.yyztdm yyztdm, a.yyztmc yyztmc,a.frdb frdb,a.frdbzjlb frdbzjlb,a.frdbzjhm frdbzjhm,a.frdblxfs frdblxfs, a.kyrq kyrq,a.yysj yysj,a.babh babh,a.barq barq,a.tyrq tyrq,a.jyfs jyfs,a.jydz jydz, a.dwfzrzjlb dwfzrzjlb,a.dwfzrzjhm dwfzrzjhm,a.dwfzr dwfzr,a.dwfzrlxfs dwfzrlxfs, a.xfshdw xfshdw,a.xfhgzh xfhgzh,a.hcdw hcdw,a.hcr hcr,a.hcsj hcsj,a.gdxx gdxx,a.zrs zrs, a.hdrs hdrs,a.bagsmc bagsmc,a.bafzrgmsfhm bafzrgmsfhm,a.bafzrxm bafzrxm,a.bafzrdh bafzrdh, a.bars bars,a.jgpxrs jgpxrs,a.bagsyj bagsyj,a.cksl cksl,a.bxbjsl bxbjsl,a.bz bz, a.dcbs dcbs,a.dcsj dcsj,a.zt zt,a.ztgbrq ztgbrq,a.scbz scbz,a.jqbm jqbm,a.zxbz zxbz, a.zxyy zxyy,a.zdskb zdskb,a.bcsj bcsj,a.lrsj lrsj,a.lrr lrr,a.lrdwbm lrdwbm,a.lrdwmc lrdwmc, a.bwbmdh bwbmdh,a.thbajgdm thbajgdm,a.thbajg thbajg,a.sfazsxt sfazsxt,a.azsxtsl azsxtsl,a.zjztdm,a.zjztmc,a.djrq,a.nsrq, a.qyjc qyjc,a.qyjcjp qyjcjp,a.qyjcqp qyjcqp,a.sgscxfjjs sgscxfjjs,a.jhltlxdm jhltlxdm,a.jhltlxmc jhltlxmc,a.wxywfl wxywfl,a.wxywfldm wxywfldm, a.frxb frxb,a.frxbdm frxbdm,a.jyfzrxb jyfzrxb,a.jyfzrxbdm jyfzrxbdm,a.jyxkzfzrq jyxkzfzrq,a.jyxkzyxqz jyxkzyxqz,a.thxkzfzrq thxkzfzrq, a.thxkzyxqz thxkzyxqz,a.yyzzfzrq yyzzfzrq,a.yyzzyxqz yyzzyxqz,a.xfshyjsbh xfshyjsbh,a.xfshyjsfzjg xfshyjsfzjg,a.xfshyjsfzjgdm xfshyjsfzjgdm, a.xfshyjsfzrq xfshyjsfzrq,a.gdjycscqbh gdjycscqbh,a.gdjycssyqbh gdjycssyqbh,(select t.cyrybh from t_qyryxx t where t.scbz=0 and t.zjhm=a.dwfzrzjhm and t.qyid=a.qyid and rownum <= 1) dwfzrcyrybh , a.sfjy sfjy,a.ssxdm ssxdm,a.ssxmc ssxmc
,a.kdjyxkzbh kdjyxkzbh,a.wstzqypzzsh wstzqypzzsh from t_qyjbxx a where a.qybm=#value#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_ljjbxx (
djxh
ljsj
ljtbsj
wldh
jjr_id
sjr_id
ljrbh
ljtbrbh
sfbj
qybm
) values (
#djxh#
#ljsj#
#ljtbsj#
#wldh#
#jjr.id#
#sjr.id#
#ljr.cyrybh#
#ljtbr.cyrybh#
#sfbj#
#qyjbxx.qybm#
)
sqlMap.update:
update t_ljjbxx ljjbxx set djxh = djxh
ljsj=#ljsj#
ljtbsj=#ljtbsj#
wldh=#wldh#
jjr_id=#jjr.id#
sjr_id=#sjr.id#
ljrbh=#ljr.cyrybh#
ljtbrbh=#ljtbr.cyrybh#
sfbj=#sfbj#
qybm = #qyjbxx.qybm#
scbzw=#scbzw#
kybz=#kybz#
sfpjbz=#sfpjbz#
where
sqlMap.select:
select ljjbxx.djxh,ljjbxx.ljsj,ljjbxx.ljtbsj,ljjbxx.sfbj,ljjbxx.kybz ,jjr.xm jjr_xm,jjr.zjlx jjr_zjlx,jjr.zjhm jjr_zjhm ,sjr.xm sjr_xm,sjr.zjlx sjr_zjlx,sjr.zjhm sjr_zjhm ,ljr.xm ljr_xm, ljr.cyrybh ljr_cyrybh
,qyjbxx.qyid qyjbxx_qyid, qyjbxx.qybm qyjbxx_qybm, qyjbxx.qymc qyjbxx_qymc, qyjbxx ,qyjbxx.gxdwbm qyjbxx_gxdwbm, qyjbxx.gxdwmc qyjbxx_gxdwmc
from t_ljjbxx ljjbxx,t_rdrjbxx jjr,t_rdrjbxx sjr,t_qyryxx ljr,t_qyjbxx qyjbxx where ljjbxx.jjr_id=jjr.id and ljjbxx.sjr_id=sjr.id and ljr.cyrybh=ljjbxx.ljrbh and qyjbxx.qybm = ljjbxx.qybm

select count(1) from (select distinct ljjbxx.djxh from t_ljjbxx ljjbxx,t_rdrjbxx jjr,t_rdrjbxx sjr,t_qyryxx ljr ,t_qyjbxx qyjbxx, t_jdpxx jdpxx where ljjbxx.jjr_id=jjr.id and ljjbxx.sjr_id=sjr.id and ljr.cyrybh=ljjbxx.ljrbh and qyjbxx.qybm = ljjbxx.qybm and ljjbxx.djxh = jdpxx.ljjbxx_id
) a

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select distinct ljjbxx.djxh,ljjbxx.ljsj,ljjbxx.ljtbsj,ljjbxx.sfbj,ljjbxx.wldh,ljjbxx.kybz,ljjbxx.sfpjbz ,jjr.xm jjr_xm,jjr.zjlx jjr_zjlx,jjr.zjhm jjr_zjhm,jjr.id jjr_id ,sjr.xm sjr_xm,sjr.zjlx sjr_zjlx,sjr.zjhm sjr_zjhm,sjr.id sjr_id ,ljr.xm ljr_xm, ljr.cyrybh ljr_cyrybh
,qyjbxx.qyid qyjbxx_qyid, qyjbxx.qybm qyjbxx_qybm, qyjbxx.qymc qyjbxx_qymc ,qyjbxx.gxdwbm qyjbxx_gxdwbm, qyjbxx.gxdwmc qyjbxx_gxdwmc from t_ljjbxx ljjbxx,t_rdrjbxx jjr,t_rdrjbxx sjr,t_qyryxx ljr ,t_qyjbxx qyjbxx, t_jdpxx jdpxx where ljjbxx.jjr_id=jjr.id and ljjbxx.sjr_id=sjr.id and ljr.cyrybh=ljjbxx.ljrbh and qyjbxx.qybm = ljjbxx.qybm and ljjbxx.djxh = jdpxx.ljjbxx_id
order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$
select * from t_ljjbxx ljjbxx where ljjbxx.djxh=#value#
select djxh from t_ljjbxx where djxh like '$value$%' and rownum <=1 order by djxh desc

select count(1) from t_ljjbxx ljjbxx,t_rdrjbxx jjr,t_rdrjbxx sjr,t_qyjbxx qyjbxx,t_jdpxx jdpxx where 1=1 and jdpxx.ljjbxx_id=ljjbxx.djxh and ljjbxx.qybm=qyjbxx.qybm and ljjbxx.jjr_id=jjr.id and ljjbxx.sjr_id=sjr.id

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select
jdpxx.jdpdlxmc jdpdlxmc,jdpxx.jdplxmc jdplxmc,jdpxx.jdpmc jdpmc,jdpxx.id id
,jjr.xm jjr_xm,jjr.zjlx jjr_zjlx,jjr.zjhm jjr_zjhm,jjr.id jjr_id
,sjr.xm sjr_xm,sjr.zjlx sjr_zjlx,sjr.zjhm sjr_zjhm,sjr.id sjr_id
,ljjbxx.djxh,ljjbxx.ljsj,ljjbxx.ljtbsj,ljjbxx.sfbj,ljjbxx.wldh
,qyjbxx.qyid qyjbxx_qyid, qyjbxx.qybm qyjbxx_qybm, qyjbxx.qymc qyjbxx_qymc ,qyjbxx.gxdwbm qyjbxx_gxdwbm, qyjbxx.gxdwmc qyjbxx_gxdwmc ,ljr.xm ljr_xm from t_ljjbxx ljjbxx,t_rdrjbxx jjr,t_rdrjbxx sjr,t_qyjbxx qyjbxx,t_jdpxx jdpxx,t_qyryxx ljr where 1=1 and jdpxx.ljjbxx_id=ljjbxx.djxh and ljjbxx.qybm=qyjbxx.qybm and ljjbxx.jjr_id=jjr.id and ljjbxx.sjr_id=sjr.id and ljjbxx.ljrbh=ljr.cyrybh
order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$

select count(1) from t_ljjbxx ljjbxx,t_rdrjbxx jjr,t_rdrjbxx sjr,t_qyjbxx qyjbxx,t_jdpxx jdpxx where 1=1 and jdpxx.ljjbxx_id=ljjbxx.djxh and ljjbxx.qybm=qyjbxx.qybm and ljjbxx.jjr_id=jjr.id and ljjbxx.sjr_id=sjr.id and jdpxx.kybz='N'

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select
jdpxx.jdpdlxmc jdpdlxmc,jdpxx.jdplxmc jdplxmc,jdpxx.jdpmc jdpmc,jdpxx.id id
,jjr.xm jjr_xm,jjr.zjlx jjr_zjlx,jjr.zjhm jjr_zjhm,jjr.id jjr_id
,sjr.xm sjr_xm,sjr.zjlx sjr_zjlx,sjr.zjhm sjr_zjhm,sjr.id sjr_id
,ljjbxx.djxh,ljjbxx.ljsj,ljjbxx.ljtbsj,ljjbxx.sfbj,ljjbxx.wldh
,qyjbxx.qyid qyjbxx_qyid, qyjbxx.qybm qyjbxx_qybm, qyjbxx.qymc qyjbxx_qymc ,qyjbxx.gxdwbm qyjbxx_gxdwbm, qyjbxx.gxdwmc qyjbxx_gxdwmc ,ljr.xm ljr_xm from t_ljjbxx ljjbxx,t_rdrjbxx jjr,t_rdrjbxx sjr,t_qyjbxx qyjbxx,t_jdpxx jdpxx,t_qyryxx ljr where 1=1 and jdpxx.ljjbxx_id=ljjbxx.djxh and ljjbxx.qybm=qyjbxx.qybm and ljjbxx.jjr_id=jjr.id and ljjbxx.sjr_id=sjr.id and ljjbxx.ljrbh=ljr.cyrybh and jdpxx.kybz='N'
order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$

select
jdpxx.jdpdlxmc jdpdlxmc,jdpxx.jdplxmc jdplxmc,jdpxx.jdpmc jdpmc,jdpxx.id id
,jjr.xm jjr_xm,jjr.zjlx jjr_zjlx,jjr.zjhm jjr_zjhm,jjr.id jjr_id
,sjr.xm sjr_xm,sjr.zjlx sjr_zjlx,sjr.zjhm sjr_zjhm,sjr.id sjr_id
,ljjbxx.djxh,ljjbxx.ljsj,ljjbxx.ljtbsj,ljjbxx.sfbj,ljjbxx.wldh
,qyjbxx.qyid qyjbxx_qyid, qyjbxx.qybm qyjbxx_qybm, qyjbxx.qymc qyjbxx_qymc ,qyjbxx.gxdwbm qyjbxx_gxdwbm, qyjbxx.gxdwmc qyjbxx_gxdwmc ,ljr.xm ljr_xm from t_ljjbxx ljjbxx,t_rdrjbxx jjr,t_rdrjbxx sjr,t_qyjbxx qyjbxx,t_jdpxx jdpxx,t_qyryxx ljr where 1=1 and jdpxx.ljjbxx_id=ljjbxx.djxh and ljjbxx.qybm=qyjbxx.qybm and ljjbxx.jjr_id=jjr.id and ljjbxx.sjr_id=sjr.id and ljjbxx.ljrbh=ljr.cyrybh
